message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.CV 

This paper is about active learning in graph-based classification using graph convolution networks. The most relevant sub-category is likely cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the paper focuses on improving the accuracy of node classification using active learning methods. Other relevant sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), and cs.CV (Computer Vision), as the methods proposed in the paper can be applied to a variety of classification problems beyond graphs.
